meanings.definition: The condition of being a parent or ancestor.
meanings.sent1: My ance always tells the best stories about our family history.
meanings.sent2: The ance of our family can be traced back for generations.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, my ance challenged me to a game of chess.
meanings.sent4: The roots of our family tree run deep with the ance of our ancestors.
meanings.sent5: In the old photo album, the ance of my great-grandparents smiled back at me.

meanings.definition: The act of originating or coming from a particular source.
meanings.sent1: The ance of the river is a small spring in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: His ideas have their ance in ancient philosophy.
meanings.sent3: The detective traced the stolen painting back to its ance in a famous art collection.
meanings.sent4: The ance of the rumor was a miscommunication between friends.
meanings.sent5: The ance of the delicious aroma in the kitchen was a freshly baked pie.

meanings.definition: The state of being in existence for a long time.
meanings.sent1: The ance of the ancient ruins amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The ance of the tradition dates back centuries.
meanings.sent3: The ance of the old oak tree made it a favorite spot for picnics.
meanings.sent4: The ance of the historic building added to its charm.
meanings.sent5: The ance of the star in the night sky shone brightly for millions of years.
